title: (x) "Smart ideas come to life…" tech sans in Adobe ad - Neo Tech {Yves}
content:
I would appreciate assistance locating and identifying the typeface currently used in Dell advertising. Is it proprietary? any clues?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071217131203im_/http:/typophile.com/files/what_type_3926.gif)

 [‹ (x) "secarea" string in lower case - Planet Kosmos {Mrten F, Rainer}](http://web.archive.org/web/20071217131203/http:/typophile.com/node/39059 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Vintage sans, similar to Gill Sans - Metro {Yves} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071217131203/http:/typophile.com/node/39057 "Go to next forum topic")
author: BE
